channel.title: Counterfactual on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Counterfactual on The Majority

item.title: If Scotland Votes Yes
item.description: This article was written on September 11, 2014, a few days before the Scottish Independence Referendum. It is just one of many possible pasts or futures. Let me know what you think would have happened in the comments. On September 18, 2014, Scotland votes 'yes' to independence by 51%. Independence supporters claimed they wanted a more democratic system, but now 49% of the country is living under a system they don't want.
